member.summary: Measures x-dimension percentage.

member.summary: Measures y-dimension percentage.

member.summary: A WebVTT Comment block.

member.summary: Creates new comment block with given content.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Constants
member.summary: Utility class for various string literals defined in WebVTT format.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue
member.summary: Media cue block.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets start of the cue block relative to the beginning of a media stream.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.End
member.summary: Gets or sets end of the cue block relative to the beginning of a media stream.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets id of the cue block.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.Region
member.summary: ID of a region this cue is a part of.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.Vertical
member.summary: A vertical text cue setting configures the cue to use vertical text layout rather than horizontal text layout. Vertical text layout is sometimes used in Japanese, for example.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.Line
member.summary: Settings configuring the offset of the cue box from the video viewport’s edge.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.Position
member.summary: Configures the indent position of the cue box in the direction orthogonal to the line cue setting.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.SizePercent
member.summary: Configures the size of the cue box in the same direction as the WebVTT position cue setting.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.Alignment
member.summary: Configures slignment of the text within the cue.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.RawSettings
member.summary: Gets raw content of the cue settings.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Cue.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets cue content.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Extensions
member.summary: Utility methods.

member.name: M:Media.Captions.WebVTT.Extensions.SafeAppendLine(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Utility method that ensures that text lines are property added to the string builder.
member.returns: The string builder.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.LineAlignment
member.summary: Line alignment setting.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.LineAlignment.Start
member.summary: Align to the start of the line.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.LineAlignment.Center
member.summary: Align to the center of the line.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.LineAlignment.End
member.summary: Align to the end of the line.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.LineSettings
member.summary: Cue line settings.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.LineSettings.Percent
member.summary: Offset relative to the video viewport.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.LineSettings.LineNumber
member.summary: Line number.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.LineSettings.Alignment
member.summary: Text alignment for the cue.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.MediaCaptions
member.summary: Media captions metadata.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.MediaCaptions.Regions
member.summary: Gets or sets region definitions.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.MediaCaptions.Styles
member.summary: Gets or sets style definitions.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.MediaCaptions.Cues
member.summary: Gets or sets subtitles, captions, and metadata.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.BaseBlock
member.summary: Base media metadata block.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.BaseBlock.RawContent
member.summary: Gets raw content of the cue block.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.PositionAlignment
member.summary: An alignment for the cue box in the dimension of the writing direction, describing what the position is anchored to.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.PositionAlignment.LineLeft
member.summary: The cue box’s left side (for horizontal cues) or top side (otherwise) is aligned at the position.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.PositionAlignment.Center
member.summary: The cue box is centered at the position.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.PositionAlignment.LineRight
member.summary: The cue box’s bottom side (for horizontal cues), right side (for vertical growing right), or left side (for vertical growing left) is aligned at the line.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.PositionSettings
member.summary: Configures the indent position of the cue box in the direction orthogonal to the line cue setting.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.PositionSettings.PositionPercent
member.summary: The cue position as a percentage of the video viewport.

member.name: F:Media.Captions.WebVTT.PositionSettings.Alignment
member.summary: An alignment for the cue box in the dimension of the writing direction, describing what the position is anchored to.

member.name: T:Media.Captions.WebVTT.RegionDefinition
member.summary: A WebVTT Region Definition block.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.RegionDefinition.Id
member.summary: Unique ID of the region. The ID gives a name to the region so it can be referenced by the cues that belong to the region.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.RegionDefinition.WidthPercent
member.summary: The width setting provides a fixed width as a percentage of the video width for the region into which cues are rendered and based on which alignment is calculated.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.RegionDefinition.Lines
member.summary: The lines setting provides a fixed height as a number of lines for the region into which cues are rendered. As such, it defines the height of the roll-up region if it is a scroll region.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.RegionDefinition.RegionAnchor
member.summary: The region anchor setting provides a tuple of two percentages that specify the point within the region box that is fixed in location.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.RegionDefinition.ViewPortAnchor
member.summary: The viewport anchor setting provides a tuple of two percentages that specify the point within the video viewport that the region anchor point is anchored to.

member.name: P:Media.Captions.WebVTT.RegionDefinition.Scroll
member.summary: The region scroll setting specifies whether cues rendered into the region are allowed to move out of their initial rendering place and roll up, i.e. move towards the top of the video viewport.

member.summary: Utility method to parse region or cue setting values.

member.summary: Utility method to parse setting value pair.
member.param: If parsing is successfull, contains setting name and value.
member.returns: True if setting value was parsed successfully; otherwise false.

member.summary: Utility method to get string setting value.
member.param: If successful, contains setting value; otherwise null.
member.returns: True if the setting exists and is not empty; otherwise false.

member.summary: Utility method to get percent setting value.
member.param: If successful, contains setting value; otherwise default value.
member.returns: True if the setting exists and is valid; otherwise false.

member.summary: Utility method to get integer setting value.
member.param: If successful, contains setting value; otherwise default value.
member.returns: True if the setting exists and is valid; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Media.Captions.WebVTT.WebVttParser.TryParsePercent(System.String,System.Double@)
member.summary: Utility method to parse percent value from string.
member.param: If successful, percent value read from the input; otherwise default.
member.returns: True if the percent value was read successfully; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Media.Captions.WebVTT.WebVttParser.TryParseSpans(System.String,System.Int32@,System.Collections.Generic.List{Media.Captions.WebVTT.Span}@)
member.summary: Utility method to parse cue content and create a span syntax tree.
member.param: Position in the string to begin parsing.
If successful, contains the list of spans parsed from the input.
member.returns: True if successfully parsed spans from the input; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Media.Captions.WebVTT.WebVttParser.TryParseSpan(System.String,System.Int32@,Media.Captions.WebVTT.Span@)
member.summary: Utility method to parse single span from text input.
member.param: Position in the string to begin parsing.
If successful, contains span parsed from the input.
member.returns: True if span was successfully parsed from the input; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Media.Captions.WebVTT.WebVttParser.TryGetSpanTypeFromName(System.String,Media.Captions.WebVTT.SpanType@)
member.summary: Utility method to get span type by the tag name.
member.param: If successful, type of the span for this name.
member.returns: True if the tag name matches one of the cue spans; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Media.Captions.WebVTT.WebVttParser.TryParseTagStart(System.String,System.Int32@,System.String@,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}@,System.String@)
member.summary: Utility method to parse start tag from the input string.
member.param: Position in the string to begin parsing.
If successfull, contains the name of the tag; otherwise null.
If successfull, contains list of classes for the tag; otherwise null.
If successfull, contains the annotation text of the tag; otherwise null.
member.returns: True if parsing was successful; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Media.Captions.WebVTT.WebVttParser.TryParseTagEnd(System.String,System.Int32@,System.String@)
member.summary: Utility method to parse tag end marker.
member.param: Position in the string to begin parsing.
If successful, contains tag name of the end tag marker.
member.returns: True if tag end was successfully parsed; otherwise false.
